data.title: Abhijit pandya posted on LinkedIn
data.meta_description: Abhijit pandya posted images on LinkedIn
data.text: Dear. Google Pay please stop sending notifications of your thrash reward system. Or at-least give an option to your users to opt-out from it. Lately me or people i know haven't received anything significant which excite to even scratch your reward stickers. I only use your App because its easy for payments and do not expect anything else from you unless you start taking feedback on your Reward Goodies from your users. Ppl Like or share this if it's the same case for you! #payments #share #like #google #googlepay
